name: Half Soul
description:
A boy met with a serious road accident, and now he only has 5 minutes before he succumbs to his injuries. Thankfully, someone is there to help him. However, it's not someone he's expecting.

From the parallel dimension, his own self has also met with a similar fate. Together they both connect in each other's minds and help each other in order to maintain consciousness for 5 minutes, by the time when they will finally reach the hospital.
